text_block_list.text:
The twinkling stars and black sky gave way to a purple glow.
――I can still see the color of that daybreak.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega

text_block_list.text:
We ran until we couldn't run any more. The two of us, together.
And then... it was like my heart started beating again.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: The reason I want to live. The reason I'm here now――

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
......So, um, that......what I told you earlier...
You misunderstood...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I did?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
When I said you need to think about yourself more...
I wasn't trying to criticize you..

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...I was... I was worried about you...!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
......Huh?
You were worried!? What? Why?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You always put the needs of others first... Like you did at the park. You only paid attention to what Opera O and Doto wanted...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Did we think about what you wanted, even once?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: So... I wanted to know if you got to do what you wanted to do. Or didn't do what you didn't want to...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Do you mean... you've been worrying about me all this time...?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Um, well, don't worry. I'm not being forced to do anything I don't want to. I had a ton of fun that day. So much fun that I want to go again!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Oh, then... That's fine.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for not noticing how you felt!
And... thank you so much for worrying about me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
...It's not that big a deal. 
You don't need to apologize, or thank me...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: That's the kind of... relationship we have.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Ayabe-san!
It is... Haha, hehehe~

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Hang on... what are you laughing for...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I mean... I just can't help it.
Hahaha~

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Please... You really are so...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... Ayabe-san.
Can I ask you for advice, one more time?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Mmhm. Of course you can.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
So, just to clear up any misunderstandings.
I'll explain what I really want!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Going out with everyone, making memories, putting on a play, I want to do all those things!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Well, really, I just love spending time with all of you!

Now that you mention it...
Your eyes light up any time we do something as a group.
text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Of course! The rivals we fight on the turf are special! The burdens we carry may be heavy, but even then we won't back down.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
We come to understand each other, and try to overcome each other―― 
I think that's what makes our bonds so strong!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...I― I see. That's how deeply you cared about us...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Is it not the same for you?
I'm sure you care about us, too!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... I don't know.
When it comes to me... and Opera O, and Doto...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: If it wasn't for you, we'd be a scattered mess.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ...Scattered...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
(...Well, they do all have strong personalities...
It's hard to imagine them matching someone else's pace...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I just... I just want everyone to have as much fun as they can. 
To me, it's second nature, but... maybe...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Maybe that's what's unique to me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I don't think the rest of us could do it, at least.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
――Then I'll keep us all together!
I won't let us get scattered!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Could you come with me, Ayabe-san?
I'm going to go talk to Digital-chan!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
So, about my role.
I want to be the one to connect all of us!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I want to be there for everyone, to spend time with everyone. I'll bring our generation together, on or off the turf!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
The kind of king only I can be――
One that brings us all together in harmony.
That's what I want to be!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: The king bringing all the nations together...! Wuhoho, that's just like Top Road-san! Then, then, maybe she can go around the kingdoms, leaving letters for the others to read!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Maybe the Mail King... No, it's missing something!
We need something with Top Road-san's signature warmth and kindness!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What do you think about "The Santa King"!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
She could bring heartfelt gifts and letters to all the other kings!
Plus it fits perfectly with the play being in Christmastime!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
The Santa King...!
That sounds great! I like it!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
A king with a job fits Top Road-san to a tee too!
So, then, the reason she reached out to all the others was out of concern for their loneliness――

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Uohaha!  The ideas are starting to flow...!
I'm sorry to go, but I've got to strike while the iron is hot and focus on writing!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Of course! Please do, Digital-chan!
